title: Transformers - Past Ideas Reemerging
html_content:
Transformers - Past Ideas Reemerging is a series of videos uploaded to Chris's YouTube channel beginning on 19 December 2023.

In the videos, Chris acts out a story starring his recently custom painted Sonichu Transformers figures and the PVCC. All of their voices are done by Chris, and they all sound similar, making it difficult to identify which character is speaking at any given time.

All of these videos have the following description:

Featuring Son-Chu and his Autobot Team of Cwcville, Virginia, they go out and search for and deal with the sudden present tense invasion of the Decepticlones of the defunct Private Villa of Corrupted Citizens and who has brought them back.

Official Christ Chan Sonichu Prime Etsy Store
[Link to OfficialCWCmart]

Contents

  • 1 Part 1
    • 1.1 Transcript
    • 1.2 Raw captions
  • 2 Part 2
    • 2.1 Transcript
    • 2.2 Raw captions
  • 3 Part 3
    • 3.1 Transcript
    • 3.2 Raw captions
  • 4 References

Part 1

Magichan visits Son-Chu and team to share his wisdom.


Transformers - Past Ideas Reemerging
Click to load content
Search for video YouTube, archive
Stardate 19 December 2023
Saga Revelations Revelations
OFFICIAL and HONEST CWC Videos
previous
Fan Mail and Cwcville Autobots Part 2 		next
Richmond International Airport Sighting


Transcript

Transcript

Son-chu: [Chris' normal voice] "Rollout, have you heard from Bumba Lumba yet?"

Rollout: [Distinguished by a nasally voice] "No. He and [indecipherable] are still out searching for clues. Those Decepticons suddenly reemerging, is quite the conundrum."

[Frame change. Son-Chu turns more towards Rollout]

Son-Chu: "I agree, especially considering those Decepticons have been discharged and discarded of many many years ago when [something]graduon retired and signed that peace treaty back in 2017. [Sigh]

In fact that those poor citizens and those couples in love are suddenly being interrupted."

[Frame change. Now non-still footage. Chris moves the toys by hand]

Rollout: "Yeah... [Groan] Especially considering the [Indecipherable] citizens was definitely bad in the first place. Fries my circuits, you know. [Groans]

Oh, anyway, Sorry for that I got some... I gathered some Intel and it looks like we got a new Decepticon base swarming nearby.

I'll yet... I don't see... too many de- I only see one Decepticon, it's not Megatron."

[Frame change, Son-Chu faces more toward the viewer]

Son-Chu: "Huh... quite curious. Even Megatron would not be stupid to be bothering anybody by who was in love... Love was not one of his many Splendid... things."

[Frame change, now a static image]

Son-Chu: "Even Magichan and his psychic Squadron are... still trying to piece together the motivation... and the source of these soulless bots. They have their spark but they have no- no motivations within them.

No personalities... it's hard to read a mind that's not there."

[Frame change, static, Rollout has hands on hips.]

Rollout: "Whatever crackpot- whatever who they are... is doing this right now... they're worse than Graduon [Indecipherable]"

Son-Chu: "Huh, that's actually funny."

[Frame change, no longer static]

[Entering from stage left is a purple toy]

Purple Toy: [In a high pitched "woman's" voice:] "Son-chu, Rollout, I think I may have figured something out from all this. There's a pattern in what those Decepticlones... have been attacking lately."

[Frame change, static image]

Son-Chu: "Do tell, Excelina."

Excelina: "Well, took a bit of piecing together but I noticed... that they... attacked the Blue Moon Cafe as a heavily sourced... initial Target in the last... attack. And then they... and then they attacked... a forklift

that actually took out- down- brought down- a bunch of forklifts.. Doing a number of dam- and then disabling... whole bunch of the other construction vehicles in the area.

And then there was like this... n- this mention I found in a... recording where someone said... 'I'm going to bring the boom doooown' and they said- and it sounded like she... said that... sing song type of voice."

[Frame change, minor pose changes]

Son-Chu: "Sing song type of voice?"

Excelina: "Yes. I actually remin- reminisceses- to about what happened back in 2018 in the events of... [Trademark Sigh] while I was an idea guy. And the inter-dimensional happenings with our Christ-Chan.

Fortunately, as you know... we were prevented from worst of it thanks to Magi-chan. But outside of that, we still have memories of that from our self-counterparts within tha- within our ah- receptors and memories."

[Frame change, Son-Chu strikes a valiant pose]

Son-Chu: "I'll never forgive those idiots from the 1218 half of our Earth who DARED [Indecipherable] and chronicle me [Ruh-roh] with my head, have been removed and put on the silver platter. [Exasperated sigh]

At least I became a head- Headmaster out of it. Still... those scars LINGER.

[Frame change, static, Rollout puts hand on chest]

Rollout: "Well I right- remember that aswell.. though fortunately I survived... [Chris audibly moves script] apart from the worst of those nightmares."

[Frame change, static, Rollout's hand is down]

Rollout: "Magichan was the one that was able to tell us... some of what happened on those alternate time [Indecipherable] that- that Christ-Chan had been deviated to. But there was one detail that he definitely made sure

It was clear and was put in our Cybertronian logs... the deceptive... evil human... that became a Headmaster herself. That might be her... I can't say for certain."

[Frame change, moving image]

Son-chu: "Well that narrows our search down a bit... find somebody who was actually more- memory-related... and link with our s- self-counterpart from that alternate timeline. We find a Cy- we find a partial Cybertronian...

that actually... does that... might find the individual that's... got these Decepticons out attacking everybody now. [Trademark hmm] If only Magichan had actually... [Indecipherable] us more about that.

But I'm certain he might be able to provide an answer or two later on.

[Weird, possibly unintentional background noise] For now though, we should continue our search. Find out... the footprints of this... cretin that ended these Decepticlones out disrupting love- not only in the state of

Virginia, but at the least throughout the entire United States of America."

[Frame change, enter Magichan suspended on a stick from top of stage]

Magichan: "[In a slightly deeper voice] And when you meditate on that for not too long you are able to find the identity of the individual that is manifesting this within our timeline in-Universe."

Son-Chu:' "Magichan!"

Magichan: "Yes, indeed it is I... of course your- her name... is within the database of the Subatronic network, but it is encrypted as... you all are aware and ofcourse... you... are aware, Rollout.

You shall find her name... reminiscent of that- of the- of the events... of the anime, Sinful Gear... but... it is within the event that was similar to that foam- that particular show... which chronicled...

such musical... events.

Find her... in whatever state of the United States of America she's in. You will find your answers indeed. We shall be in touch, the psychic Squadron and I."

[Magichan exits stage up]

[Frame change]

Son-chu: "Thank you Magichan... yeah... and ofcourse it be... among the sage-ness- the psychic ones that tend to want leave the most direct details and clues... overlooked for us to figure out for ourselves.

Anyway, I'll continue to check computers, I'm certain I'm going to find that detail. [Trademark hmm] I'm wondering if it might be possibly one of the old books."

Excelina: "Oh you mean the comic books that Christ-Chan wrote?"

Son-Chu: "I think so at Excelina, but we'll figure it out shortly enough. Wher- wherever she's doing what... their mo- what their motivations are... it can't be any good."

[Frame change]

[Loud autistic yelling of character off-screen]

Alpha[something]: "AAAAAAAAA...Warriors... [In an old fogey voice] listen to me, young Warriors... there's a lot more to listen- to doolee- to me what meets the eye. The [Indecipherable] pun of that... from the

theme songs... and all that... being... irrelevant... to... the situation at hand."

[Frame change, static image]

Son-Chu: "What sage advice do you have for us today, Alpha[Indecipherable] on and please not- let not- let it be another old individual brain fart... or... paraphrasing that is... misleading or otherwise... awkward."

Alpha[something]: "I'll tell you this... bad wisdom... tale and true... young warriors. You delve into... details... that came from an alternate universal timeline line... you could very well mess up with this timeline...

and yourselves as well. So be careful... when you seek this information... because... it could potentially lead... to [Chris drops voice:]dissemination. [Starts voice again] The insights I get from the cosmos

and the... [Indecipherable] records and everything... and then they escape me... I feel so [Indecipherable]. Psychic powers, eh. Live 'em, love them."

Son-Chu: "We know- we know [Indecipherable] we appreciate Magichan the psychic Squadron."

Alpha[something]: "Oh good, good, good. Do very well in that. it's certainly a lot better than the advice I gave to the old Decepticons years ago... about when the trouble reached the bung hole and the moon... fallen

into a vat of tapioka..."

[Frame change]

Rollout: "And there it is... it just became awkward. And unfortunately, I actually know what that- means."

Excelina: "Yeah you would, [Voice crack] Rollout."

Rollout: "Hey, don't get snipey with me!"

[Frame change]

Alpha[something]: "Well! I' better go get my soup for the kitchen. And... I actually do remember how I helped Optimus Prime, but unfortunately... it escapes my consciousness at the moment. [Autistically loud:] FAREWELL YOOOOOOUUUNNNGGG WARRRRRIOOORRRRSSSS."

[Alpha[something] exits stage left]

Rollout: "Well, I better get back to cracking... that database is not going to crack itself. And that ladybot... or whatever... is not gonna' to get away with this."

[Frame change]

Son-Chu: "Right, you keep up the good work, Excelina... continue your- research In progress. And give yourself a little recharge before you head back out."

EExcelina: "Allright, but of course I also wanted to mention that [Indecipherable name] and and Jet have found something back in the West District. So... they'd check in shortly I'd hope. All right...

I'ma get a quick recharge and I'm going to get back on [Indecipherable] about this, [Indecipherable] for quite a long time, Son-Chu."

Son-Chu: "It's a lot of hard work, Excellina. But regardless, you know... it's well worth it... as we all continue to transform and roll out."

Excelina: "Optimus Prime would be so proud of you."

Son-Chu: "Bumblebee is too, you know that.

Excelina: "Yeah."

[Video thankfully ends]

Part 2

Part 2 includes a battle scene with some basic stop-motion effects. Chris's arm is briefly visible at 0:13.

Prowler: "Someone else is running the strings"

Light Powered Cwclight Reviews - Bumba-Lumba


Transcript

Transcript
[Using a greenscreen, Chris has the toys come into and out of a static city background]

[A bad-guy comes into view from stage right]

[Yelling, he hits a revealed Blue good-guy on the arm with his weapon]

[With Chris providing "Pew" noises, the bad-guy toy (using basic stop-motion) shoots the good-guy toy]

[The good-guy deflects these projectiles, with Chris providing "Dunk!" noises]

[The good-guy fights back and wins]

Good guy: "I think that's the last of 'em. Jet, [to a sentient weapon in his hand] you transform and go seek out- see for any more of those deceptic clones. FLY!"

Jet: "[Transforming Eh noises] Weeeeee."

Good guy: "Phew. Never a boring day in CWCville. Oh, Proweller. [Proweller enters from stage left]"

Prowler: "Oh, I took care of all of the Decepti-clones in my part of CWCville. And p-perimeters outside- city- are... seem to be very clear... of any more of them cretins."

Good-guy: "Confound these decepti-clones- of PVC citizens. Don't they ever stop even WHEN... Mary Lee Walsh and Graduon had retired...?"

Prowler: "Somebody else is running the strings... [Indecipherable mumbling] we're trying to figure out what that is. At least we're on the case."

Good-guy: "Right. I sent Jet out to go... scout for some more. P[Indecipherable] that's the last of them for now."

Prowler: "For now. If not... other day..."

Good-guy: "[Deep sigh] Better check in with base. [Arm-something] to- b-b-base [Possibly Bumba-lumba base]. [Arm-something] to bo-bot base. We have cleared the city... of all the- of many of those scoundrel-ass vessels... tractors... and [Indecipherable] as possible. I just took down the last one in my sector. Prowler has confirmed that the perimeter is clear for now.

[Scene changes to Son-Chu and Excelina back at b-b-base]

Son-chu: "We read you loud and clear, [Arm-something (Good-guy)] Excelina and I are getting ready to head out to go scan [Higher-something]. We will meet you and Prowler in Richmond at 0700. See ya'll later.

Bumba-lumba does not- to auto-bot base is [Indecipherable], Bumba-lumba base to autobot base is [Indecipherable], do you copy me, Sonichu? Anybody over there."

Sonichu: "Bumba-lumba this is Sonichu. What's your status?"

Son-Chu: "I believe we have found our culprit. We're gonna- Raven and I are scan the- troop... right now."

Sonichu: "Who do you see?"

Son-Chu: "[Indecipherable] still get the details. Raven do you see anything?"

Raven: [In a high pitched voice/childish voice:] [Possibly off-screen or Excelina by mistake] "I think so... I see this pumpkin [Indecipherable] she's separated from her body.. she's talking to some smack with his robot.. I think- for radio. Oh wait! There's a racecar- come in. What the hell's going on over there? The racecar transformed... hm, ok, who's this thing? She looks like a real [Indecipherable]!"

Sonichu: "[Sighs] Give us your status as soon as you can, Bumba-lumba. We'll see you in Richmond."

Someone, most likely Son-Chu: "Alright, we'll see ya'll later."

[Video abruptly ends]

Chris claimed he personally edited the video.[1]
